articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.4 (2020, T-Mobile) - Review 2020 - PCMag AU
articles.description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.4 for T-mobile is a light, sharp, 4G-enabled tablet with unfortunate Wi-Fi issues.
articles.content: The petite Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.4 is the right size and price for a go-anywhere, color e-reading tablet. At $265 with T-Mobile service, it comes in at a much lower price than its primary rival, the… [+7042 chars]
